author: alberto-sanchez
body:
I have added the possibility to check for antiparticles, making the input list of particles shorter, specially if I want to check for all b-hadrons. I also added some protection to the rapidity calculation, since in previous version was calculated for all particles in the event, even those with very small energy. In the process I add the option of debugging.  

Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_1_X #15876 (original by @alberto-sanchez).
title: single particle filter, add needed features
